attributes.action: Save the Coronation Street catering van
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown.
I read with dismay that the Coronation Street catering van will be removed after today and the actors will no longer be entitled to free tea and bacon butties. 

Personally I feel these hard working actors deserve more than this and cannot be expected to do the job that brings joy to millions without these privilages. 

I feel that something should be done and the catering van should be saved!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
